global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Sea Slope 2 (SS-2) line 2020-06-13T21:49:01 UTC and recovered 2020-08-19T22:00:00 UTC. Other than the glider periodically exhibiting poor steering and veering off of the SS-2 trackline, this was a relatively normal deployment. Science sampling was disabled 2020-08-08 to conserve battery for recovery.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_388
